testCases.label: Verify Vehicle.display_info returns proper formatted output
testCases.description: Checks that Vehicle('Toyota', 'Camry', 2022).display_info() returns the string '2022 Toyota Camry', confirming correct string construction in the lab’s Vehicle class.

testCases.label: Verify Vehicle.start returns no value
testCases.description: Ensures that calling start() on a Vehicle instance returns None as expected in the lab’s base-class behavior.

testCases.label: Verify Car inherits from Vehicle
testCases.description: Confirms that the Car class is a subclass of Vehicle, validating proper inheritance structure for the lab’s OOP hierarchy.

testCases.label: Verify Car.drive returns no value
testCases.description: Checks that Car('Toyota', 'Camry', 2022, 'Gasoline').drive() returns None, as defined in the lab’s Car class behavior.

testCases.label: Verify Car.refuel returns no value
testCases.description: Ensures that Car('Toyota', 'Camry', 2022, 'Gasoline').refuel() returns None, matching the lab’s expected implementation of the refuel method.
